content.description:
Wiccawhirl is great problem that climbs solid rock on a good variety of holds.

Sit start with hands on a pair of crimps. From there, move up and match on the large, triangular shelf, then match hands on the crescent-shaped sloper crimp, pop up with a right to a three finger pocket, pop again with a left to a four finger pocket, then gain the crimps on the slab, and top it out.
content.protection: A few pads, the landing is good.
content.location: This is on the southwest face of Incognito Boulder.

content.description:
The opening sequence for Thundering Silence is one-of-a-kind for Unaweep bouldering.

Sit start with a good left hand edge and a right hand on the sloper lip. From there, crank up, mantle a right hand, reach for the edge at the lip, position the feet, match the right hand next to the left, then traverse left through edges until joining the finish of

Wiccawhirl

.

You can finish directly up without using the end of Wiccawhirl but I had that one cleaned already so I used it.
content.protection: At least three pads. The problem climbs over a good landing, but there is a rock present at the start and a tree behind the middle section.
content.location:
It climbs the west face of Incognito. Start right of

Satan's Quill

.

content.description:
Satan's Quill ascends a solid face of a great landing. The problem's first move is likely its hardest, the sidepull isn't much from below, but it fits like a glove once you get higher on it.

Sit start with a low left hand undercling and a right hand sidepull. From there, pull up to a left hand edge, follow to a right hand edge, bump the right hand up to a sidepull, reach the jug-hueco-thing, connect with the finish of

Wiccawhirl

, and finish the remainder on edges to reach an easy mantel.

You can finish directly up without using the end of Wiccawhirl but I had that one cleaned already so I used it.
content.protection: A pair of pads. The landing is really good.
content.location:
It climbs the west face of Incognito, just right of

Wiccawhirl

.

content.description: Sit start on the bumps of the north arete. From there, reach a right hand mail slot, then a left hand sidepull, walk the feet over, then head straight up on edges and bumps to reach an easy mantel.
content.protection: A pad or two will work. The landing is great.
content.location: It climbs the north face of Incognito.
